compiler

Class Parser

  • java.lang.Object
    • compiler.Parser

  •  class Parser
extends java.lang.Object
    Simple recursive descent expression parser that produces DAGs as output.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) class  Parser.ParseError
      Exception raised when the parser sees a syntax error.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private NodeDictionary dict
      The node dictionary for constructing a DAG of the input.
      private Scanner.Token lookAhead
      The lookahead token.
      private Scanner scanner
      Scanner for obtaining tokens from the input.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Parser(Scanner scanner)
      Construct a new parser with given scanner for input.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void advance()
      Advance the parser by reading the next token into the lookahead.
      private Node comparison()
      Two operands connected by a comparison.
      private Node conjunction()
      Any number of operands connected by "and" operations.
      private Node disjunction()
      Any number of perands connected by "or" operations.

      An atomic operand or any expression in parentheses.

      Any number of operands connected by additive operators.
      (package private) Node parseToDag()
      Run the parser on the scanner's input and return the resulting DAG or throw a ParseError exception.
      private Node signedFactor()
      A single operand with an optional leading minus sign.
      private Node term()
      Any number of operands connected by multiplicative operators.

      • match

        private void match(Scanner.Token token)
            throws Parser.ParseError
        Check the lookahead for equality with the given token. Advance if the lookahead matches, otherwise raise a syntax error.
        Parameters:
        token - token to meach
        Throws:
        Parser.ParseError
